person.note: 张仃的儿子 . 母亲陈布文，姐姐陈乔乔、大哥张耿军、弟弟张大伟、张寥寥、张沛沛。
爷爷是上海名中医，叫严苍山
author of the books Xiangxin weilai 相信未來 and Zhe shi sidian bafen Beijing 《這是四點零八分的北京》both written in 1968. Very influential among zhiqing.
son of Guo Moruo and Yu Liqun
grandson of Zhang Dongsun 张东荪. Son of Zhang Zongbing 张宗炳. Was sent to a laogai for 15 years. He founded the X literary society and the X shouchao journal.
he grew up in Beijing. Friend of Zhang Langlang
川东师范学堂第二十三任校长黄子裳之子 。 Aus Remembrance: [朱]时贤读的东西比较多，在部队中接触过一些内部资料，如《我军不利战战史》，这让他对众多问题的看法发生 了重大变化。
He was the group leader of Huang Xiaolong.
His father was Gan Chongdou.
Grew up in Beijing. 抗日名将蒋光鼐之女
张仃的儿子 . 母亲陈布文，姐姐陈乔乔、大哥张耿军和张郎郎、弟弟张寥寥、张沛沛。
黄炜华之子?
父亲是著名历史学家李新
he was persecuted and sent to Henan during the CR

person.note: 1945 and 1946 can be found for his birth year, academic publications rather stick to 1946. Generally speaking, few information is known about his early years.
He was also in prison with Fang Zifen.
Her father was 戴煌.
He was a member from anti revolution Lin Biao-Jiang Qing group.
She went in the countryside in 1969-1974 with her parents.
He was 6 years worker after 1971.
Grew up in Beijing. From 1971-1975 he was rusticated in Wuxiang 武乡 (Shanxi).

person.note: not in a real zhiqing. He was sentenced to 3 years of laogai in 1964 and used to live on the countryside close to Xi'an from 1967 onwards for a longer time.
he was an expert on Chinese folk religions

person.note: not rusticated but imprisoned for four years during CR
He was nearly 50 years old around 1979, so he was probably born in 192x..193x.
He was sent to PL0511 as worker in 1973.
He was also rusticated in PL0541 between 1971 and 1972.
He was one of the editors of W0356.
He was one of the editors of W0356.
Li Yizhe refers to a group of three authors: Li Zhengtian, ChenYiyang, Wang Xizhe, Guo Hongzhi
